item.title: Templating mermaid diagrams
item.description: Related mustache templating processor // Bodacious Blog Summary I would like to place lengthy strings into mermaid diagram nodes, but I don’t want to worry about escaping characters or formatting the text. I design a simple templating pipeline for automatically escaping text and inserting it into mermaid diagrams and also for working with mermaid graphs within emacs' babel. I have made it trivial for me to develop large flowcharts with large amounts of text and special characters.
